content: materials needed -3 25mm crochet hook 3 75mm also works -worsted weight yarn in the colors of your choice you can use whatever colors you want but for the instructions i marked the five colors i used blue pink purple white and yellow -fiber fill -stitch markers -yarn needle -scissors -pins abbreviations -magic_ring- magic_ring -st- stitch -single_crochet- single_crochet -increase- increase -decrease- decrease -chain- chain
